text: Mary Clark Webster is an American politician from Maine. A Republican, Webster served in the Maine House of Representatives. In 1989–90, she was the House Minority Leader. Maine Politics & Government By Kenneth T. Palmer, G. Thomas Taylor p. 70 The 126th legislature passed a joint resolution honoring Webster and other prominent female political figures in the state.JOINT RESOLUTION IN HONOR OF WOMEN'S HISTORY MONTH AND IN RECOGNITION OF THE CONTRIBUTIONS THAT WOMEN MAKE TO MAINE AND TO THE UNITED STATES ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Minority Leaders of the Maine House of Representatives Category:Maine Republicans Category:People from Cape Elizabeth, Maine Category:Women state legislators in Maine
title: Mary Clark Webster
